summary: Adds a bit more stats to the Daedric artifacts and the God amulets.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Adds a bit more stats to the Daedric artifacts and the God amulets, but not too overpowered.
I will be adding more enchantments when I have the time. 
[/size][/font][size=2]
[b][font=Comic Sans MS]Compatibility :
Likely not compatible with mods that  change the base Daedric artifacts and the God amulets items & Wuuthrad, as well with the enchantments/magic effects. 

[/font][/b][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Changes:[/size][/font]

Most of the "enchantment power" on the items have been double 
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Daedric 
[/size][/font]
[size=2]Volendrung[/size]
[size=2] Base damage:  25 => 34[/size]

[size=2]Mehrunes' Razor[/size]
[size=2]Base damage:  11 = > 20[/size]

[size=2]Ebony Blade[/size]
[size=2]Base damage:  11 => 25[/size]

[size=2]Dawnbreaker[/size]
[size=2]Base damage:  12 =>  20[/size]
[size=2]Enchantments: changes "Fire damage health" to 15 [/size]

[size=2]Mace of Molag Bal[/size]
[size=2]Base damage:  16 => 34[/size]
[size=2]Enchantments: Adds "Absorb health' Mag 5 for 3 seconds on POWER ATTACK.[/size]
[size=2]Changes Stamina & Magicka damage to 31 [/size]

[size=2]Spellbreaker[/size]
[size=2]Base armour: 38 = > 45[/size]
[size=2]Enchantments: Changes "Ward Deflection Wardpower" to 65[/size]

[size=2]Ebony Mail[/size]
[size=2]Base  armour : 45 => 52[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]"God" items[/size][/font]
[size=2]Blessing of Stendarr: Block 10 => 17[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Arkay: Health 10 => 17[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Dibella: Speech 10 => 17[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Julianos: magicka  10 => 17[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Kynareth: Stamina 10 => 17 [/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Mara: Restoration Mod: 10 => 17[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Akatosh: Regen magicka 32[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Talos: Shout cool down 20% => 30%[/size]
[size=2]Blessing of Zenithar: Barter/speechcraft 10 => 17[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Misc:[/size][/font]
Wuuthrad 
Base damage: 25 => 35
[/center]
author: XandK
